snippet: Prosecutors said the defendants squatted in a house under renovation, took a kidnapped girl there, raped her and forced her into prostitution.
abstract: Queens prosecutors charge Gary Council and five other men with kidnapping a 15-year-old-girl, and keeping her in an abandoned house in Ozone Park where they drugged, raped and forced her into prostitution over a six-day period; all six men are charged with rape, kidnapping, sex trafficking and burglary.
lead_paragraph: Prosecutors said the defendants squatted in a house under renovation, took a kidnapped girl there, raped her and forced her into prostitution.

headline.seo: 6 Charged in Queens Kidnapping and Rape
headline.main: Vacant Queens House Used for Sex Crimes, Police Say
headline.print_headline: Vacant Queens House Used for Sex Crimes, Police Say
